ModMetaData.name: Camping Stuff
ModMetaData.author: Alias
ModMetaData.description:
-----Camping Stuff BETA----- v1.0.0b Camping Stuff Mod By Alias (originally crated by Nandonalt): Adds Deployable Tents(Normal, Medium, Big, and Long) and Portable Stoves.
Changelog: v1.0.0b- Complete re-write, [elaborate before release!!!] v0.6.0- v1.0 support v0.5.2- Fixed bills not working on portable stoves v0.5.1- Fixed portable stoves not being portable v0.5.0- b19 support, removed butchering spots, support for arbitrary tent sizes, new tent size: long v0.4.0- b18 support, removed sleeping bags v0.3.0- a17 support v0.2.0- enables you to make tents from any textile and adds two new sizes to tents: medium and big.
